name: Astro Juice
description:
AstroJuice is a game developed for the Ludum Dare Game Jam based on the theme "stuck in a loop". You must lead your character to the end of the game by looping between colors and abilities and going over and over the same path. Reach the end of the game with as few deaths as possible!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/astro-juice-ding-espm-rj

Q - Reset your color

A or Left Arrow - Move left

D or Right Arrow - Move right

Spacebar - Jump
